src:
Charlotte County Sheriffs ask the public's help identifying three men accused of theft
06 Nov 2019, 16:18 by WFTX Digital Team



CHARLOTTE COUNTY, Fla. — Charlotte County Police are searching for three suspects seen taking merchandise from an AT&T store.
The theft occurred on October 25th, and the three men stole display merchandise.
If you know something about this crime, your tip could be eligible for a cash reward through Southwest Florida Crime Stoppers if your information leads to an arrest. Call 1-800-780-TIPS (8477) to submit your tip.
